last_episode_to_air.name: Baboons Rising
last_episode_to_air.overview: There is an uprising of baboons which led to the death of the President as Axe Cop enlists the Almighty Bear and his bear army of Bearopolis to help fight the baboon army. When the baboon army plans to target the Secret President, Axe Cop, Flute Cop, and the Almighty Bear must enter the Secret President's bloodstream in order to confront the baboon's leader the Almighty Baboon.

name: Axe Cop
overview: Axe Cop is an animated series based on the webcomic of the same name. It premiered on Fox on July 21, 2013, as a part of the channel's Animation Domination HD programming block. The series aired 6 11-minute episodes in its first season, which will later expand to half-hour episodes should the show be renewed for a second season.

episodes.name: Night Mission: Stealing Friends Back
episodes.overview: Axe Cop, Flute Cop, Grey Diamond, Army Chihuahua and Liborg help fellow superhero Bat Warthog Man find his missing friends.

episodes.name: Zombie Island ... In Space
episodes.overview: Axe Cop and Flute Cop look for a kidnapped British scientist and travel to the Zombie Island planet to help save a queen.

episodes.name: An American Story
episodes.overview: AXE COP tells the story of how his great-great-great-great-great-great-great-grandfather, Book Cop, invented the Fourth of July.

episodes.name: Babysitting Unibaby
episodes.overview: When FLUTE COP finally has enough money to take his wife, Anita, on a romantic anniversary trip to Hawaii, he enlists AXE COP to babysit his daughter, Unibaby. Unfortunately, AXE COP hates babies and just wants to have fun, so he steals Unibaby's magical horn to transport himself to Magic World, along with Dr. Rang and Chubby Doll.

episodes.name: Birthday Month
episodes.overview: AXE COP's birthday month is not going as planned when he accidentally murders a group of good mermaids. However, FLUTE COP and DR. RANG give AXE COP the best birthday present ever: finding out who killed AXE COP's parents - BAD SANTA. AXE COP travels to South Pole World in order to find BAD SANTA and bring him to justice.

episodes.name: The Rabbit Who Broke All the Rules
episodes.overview: AXE COP gets a lesson in parenting when a mysterious, silent boy shows up asking AXE COP to be his father. After some nudging by FLUTE COP, AXE COP brings the boy to his Tri-Annual Learn Out camp to teach him how to kick and chop heads off. However, no one knows that the boy happens to be possessed by the soul of AXE COP's first kill: a rabbit that broke all the rules by eating coconuts.

episodes.name: No More Bad Guys
episodes.overview: Axe Cop has killed all the bad guys on earth, which means only one thing: new jobs.

episodes.name: Super Axe
episodes.overview: Axe Cop must convince his old college buddy, Super Axe, to go on one last adventure to save the world -- by travelling back in time.

episodes.name: When Night Creatures Attack
episodes.overview: Axe Cop and Flute Cop track down the Sun Thieves before the world is torn apart by Night Creatures.

episodes.name: 28 Days Before
episodes.overview: It's Thanksgiving and Axe Cop hasn't been seen since Halloween. How will his team celebrate Thanksgiving without him?

episodes.name: Taxi Cop
episodes.overview: Young Axey and Flutey grow up to run a taxi company, just falling short of their childhood dreams of becoming crime fighters.

episodes.name: The Dumb List
episodes.overview: Axe Cop is forced to let a girl join the team even though he has put all girls on the dumb list.

episodes.name: Night Mission: The Moon
episodes.overview: Flute Cop convinces Axe Cop to take him on his very first night mission... to the moon!

episodes.name: Heads Will Roll
episodes.overview: Following the fight against Goo-rilla with the help of some Ice Vikings, Axe Cop is arrested for breaking the laws and is incarcerated in the local prison. Once their, the warden allows Axe Cop to chop the heads off of the inmates. Flute Cop later discovers that the warden is using the heads to grow his own henchmen so that he can sell them to every supervillain that needs loyal henchmen.

episodes.name: Bald Cop
episodes.overview: Axe Cop is forced into hiding by the sinister Hell Chicken, while the world falls ruin to the Hell Chicken Zombie Apocalypse.

episodes.name: The Center of the Ocean
episodes.overview: Axe Cop goes to a fancy dinner party that falls under siege by evil aliens who are there to kidnap the Water Queen.

episodes.name: Mark Frankenstein
episodes.overview: Grey Diamond explores his origins and searches his past for his true identity.

episodes.name: President Cop
episodes.overview: Axe Cop declares himself President of The World and unleashes a million years of peace and boredom.

episodes.name: Axe Cop Saves God
episodes.overview: After Axe Cop's ham restaurant comes under attack by hell demons, he must venture to Heaven to protect God from Satan's forces.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Mate
episodes.overview: Axe Cop needs to find the best roller-skating partner so he can win the Ultimate Space Trampoline grand prize, but little does he know that a much grander prize lies ahead.

episodes.name: The Extincter
episodes.overview: When Bigfoot goes missing, Axe Cop & Flute Cop must team up with the Mysterious Beast Force to find him and put a stop to the Extincter once and for all.

episodes.name: Baboons Rising
episodes.overview: There is an uprising of baboons which led to the death of the President as Axe Cop enlists the Almighty Bear and his bear army of Bearopolis to help fight the baboon army. When the baboon army plans to target the Secret President, Axe Cop, Flute Cop, and the Almighty Bear must enter the Secret President's bloodstream in order to confront the baboon's leader the Almighty Baboon.
